rules_text:
[i]({T}: Add {G}.)[/i]
Leira Outcrop enters tapped unless you control a Swamp and an Island.
{1}{B}{G}{U}, {T}, Sacrifice Leira Outcrop: Each player mills three cards. For each creature card put into a graveyard this way, you create a 1/1 white Viking creature token. Activate only as a sorcery.
